alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:52AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pulaski and eastern Wythe Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 252 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Max Meadows, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pulaski... Wytheville... Max Meadows... Allisonia... Patterson... Fort Chiswell... and Draper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
